description: This header file defines function prototypes, constants, and data structures for the Wi-Fi hardware abstraction layer (HAL) in a broadband router or similar device. It includes definitions for radio and interface management, traffic statistics, associated devices, and configuration parameters, enabling standardized access to Wi-Fi hardware features.

methods.name: wifi_getHalVersion
methods.description: Retrieves the version string of the Wi-Fi HAL, formatted as 'major.minor.maintenance'.

methods.name: wifi_factoryReset
methods.description: Performs a factory reset of the Wi-Fi subsystem, restoring default settings.

methods.name: wifi_factoryResetRadios
methods.description: Resets all radio parameters without affecting access point configurations.

methods.name: wifi_factoryResetRadio
methods.description: Resets specific radio parameters identified by radio index.

methods.name: wifi_setLED
methods.description: Sets the system LED status indicator based on the provided enable flag.

methods.name: wifi_init
methods.description: Initializes all Wi-Fi radios and related hardware components.

methods.name: wifi_reset
methods.description: Resets the entire Wi-Fi subsystem, including access point settings.

methods.name: wifi_down
methods.description: Turns off transmit power for all Wi-Fi radios.

methods.name: wifi_createInitialConfigFiles
methods.description: Creates necessary configuration files for Wi-Fi operation.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioCountryCode
methods.description: Gets the country code for a specified radio index.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioCountryCode
methods.description: Sets the country code for a specified radio index.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioNumberOfEntries
methods.description: Retrieves the total number of Wi-Fi radios available.

methods.name: wifi_getSSIDNumberOfEntries
methods.description: Retrieves the total number of SSID entries configured.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioEnable
methods.description: Fetches whether a specific radio is enabled.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioEnable
methods.description: Enables or disables a specific Wi-Fi radio.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioStatus
methods.description: Gets the operational status (enabled/disabled) of the radio.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioIfName
methods.description: Returns the interface name associated with the specified radio index.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioMaxBitRate
methods.description: Provides the maximum PHY bit rate supported by the radio.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioSupportedFrequencyBands
methods.description: Lists supported frequency bands for the specified radio.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioOperatingFrequencyBand
methods.description: Returns the current operating frequency band of the radio.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioSupportedStandards
methods.description: Lists supported wireless standards (e.g., 802.11b/g/n/ac).

methods.name: wifi_getRadioStandard
methods.description: Retrieves the current wireless standard and flags indicating specific standards (b/g/n/ac).

methods.name: wifi_setRadioChannelMode
methods.description: Sets the operating mode and standard flags for the radio.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioPossibleChannels
methods.description: Gets a list of supported channels for the radio.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioChannelsInUse
methods.description: Lists channels currently in use by the radio.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioChannel
methods.description: Gets the current operating channel number.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioChannel
methods.description: Sets the operating channel number.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioAutoChannelEnable
methods.description: Enables or disables auto channel selection.

methods.name: wifi_getRouterEnable
methods.description: Checks if the router mode is enabled on the specified WLAN index.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioAutoChannelSupported
methods.description: Checks if auto channel selection is supported on the radio.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioAutoChannelEnable
methods.description: Gets whether auto channel selection is enabled.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioAutoChannelEnable
methods.description: Sets auto channel selection mode.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioDCSSupported
methods.description: Checks if Dynamic Channel Selection (DCS) is supported on the radio.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioDCSupported
methods.description: Checks if Dynamic Channel Selection (DCS) is supported on the radio.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioDfsSupport
methods.description: Get radio DFS support.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioDfsEnable
methods.description: Get the Dfs enable status.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioDfsEnable
methods.description: Set the Dfs enable status.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioAutoChannelRefreshPeriodSupported
methods.description: Check if the driver support the AutoChannelRefreshPeriod.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioAutoChannelRefreshPeriod
methods.description: Get the DCS refresh period in seconds.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioAutoChannelRefreshPeriod
methods.description: Set the DCS refresh period in seconds.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioOperatingChannelBandwidth
methods.description: Get the Operating Channel Bandwidth such as '20MHz', '40MHz', etc.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioOperatingChannelBandwidth
methods.description: Set the Operating Channel Bandwidth.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioExtChannel
methods.description: Get the secondary extension channel position, 'AboveControlChannel' or 'BelowControlChannel'.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioExtChannel
methods.description: Set the secondary extension channel position.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioGuardInterval
methods.description: Get the guard interval value, eg '400nsec' or '800nsec'.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioGuardInterval
methods.description: Set the guard interval value.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioMCS
methods.description: Get the Modulation Coding Scheme index, eg '-1', '1', '15'.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioMCS
methods.description: Set the Modulation Coding Scheme index.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioTransmitPowerSupported
methods.description: Get supported Transmit Power list, eg '0,25,50,75,100'.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioTransmitPower
methods.description: Get current Transmit Power, eg '75', '100'.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioTransmitPower
methods.description: Set current Transmit Power.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioIEEE80211hSupported
methods.description: Get 80211h Supported.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioIEEE80211hEnabled
methods.description: Get 80211h feature enable.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioIEEE80211hEnabled
methods.description: Set 80211h feature enable.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioCarrierSenseThresholdRange
methods.description: Indicates the Carrier Sense ranges supported by the radio.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioCarrierSenseThresholdInUse
methods.description: The RSSI signal level at which CS/CCA detects a busy condition.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioCarrierSenseThresholdInUse
methods.description: Set Carrier sense threshold in use for the selected radio.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioBeaconPeriod
methods.description: Get time interval between transmitting beacons, in milliseconds.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioBeaconPeriod
methods.description: Set time interval between transmitting beacons.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioBasicDataTransmitRates
methods.description: Get the set of data rates, in Mbps, that have to be supported by all stations that desire to join this BSS.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioBasicDataTransmitRates
methods.description: Set the data rates, in Mbps, that have to be supported by all stations.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioTrafficStats2
methods.description: Get detailed radio traffic static info.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioTrafficStatsMeasure
methods.description: Set radio traffic static measuring rules.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioTrafficStatsRadioStatisticsEnable
methods.description: Set radio traffic statistics enable.

methods.name: wifi_applyRadioSettings
methods.description: Apply (push) all previously set radio level variables to make these settings active in hardware.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioResetCount
methods.description: Get the radio reset count.

methods.name: wifi_getSSIDRadioIndex
methods.description: Get the radio index associated with the SSID entry.

methods.name: wifi_getSSIDEnable
methods.description: Get SSID enable configuration parameters.

methods.name: wifi_setSSIDEnable
methods.description: Set SSID enable configuration parameters.

methods.name: wifi_getSSIDStatus
methods.description: Get SSID enable status.

methods.name: wifi_getSSIDName
methods.description: Get SSID Name associated with the Access Point index.

methods.name: wifi_setSSIDName
methods.description: Set SSID Name associated with the Access Point index.

methods.name: wifi_getBaseBSSID
methods.description: Get the BSSID.

methods.name: wifi_getSSIDMACAddress
methods.description: Get the MAC address associated with this Wifi SSID.

methods.name: wifi_getSSIDTrafficStats2
methods.description: Get the basic SSID traffic static info.

methods.name: wifi_applySSIDSettings
methods.description: Apply SSID and AP settings to hardware.

methods.name: wifi_getNeighboringWiFiDiagnosticResult2
methods.description: Start Wi-Fi scan and retrieve neighbor access point info for parsing.

methods.name: wifi_getBandSteeringCapability
methods.description: Get Band Steering Capability support.

methods.name: wifi_getBandSteeringEnable
methods.description: Get Band Steering enable status.

methods.name: wifi_setBandSteeringEnable
methods.description: Turn on/off Band steering.

methods.name: wifi_getBandSteeringBandUtilizationThreshold
methods.description: Get and set BandUtilizationThreshold parameters.

methods.name: wifi_setBandSteeringBandUtilizationThreshold
methods.description: Set BandUtilizationThreshold parameters.

methods.name: wifi_getBandSteeringRSSIThreshold
methods.description: Get and set Band steering RSSIThreshold.

methods.name: wifi_setBandSteeringRSSIThreshold
methods.description: Set Band steering RSSIThreshold.

methods.name: wifi_getBandSteeringPhyRateThreshold
methods.description: Get and set physical modulation rate threshold for band steering.

methods.name: wifi_setBandSteeringPhyRateThreshold
methods.description: Set physical modulation rate threshold.

methods.name: wifi_getBandSteeringLog
methods.description: Retrieve band steering log with steering trigger reasons.

methods.name: wifi_factoryResetAP
methods.description: Restore AP parameters to defaults without changing other AP or Radio parameters.

methods.name: wifi_getBandSteeringApGroup
methods.description: Get or set the Band Steering Access Point Group.

methods.name: wifi_getBandSteeringOverloadInactiveTime
methods.description: Get or set the overload inactive time parameter.

methods.name: wifi_getBandSteeringIdleInactiveTime
methods.description: Get or set the idle inactive time parameter.

methods.name: wifi_resetBandSteeringSSIDSecurityParams
methods.description: Reset Band Steering SSID security parameters to default.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioCtsProtectionEnable
methods.description: Enable CTS protection for the radio used by this AP.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioObssCoexistenceEnable
methods.description: Enable OBSS Coexistence to fall back to 20MHz if necessary.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioFragmentationThreshold
methods.description: Set fragmentation threshold in bytes for the radio used by this AP.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioSTBCEna
methods.description: Enable STBC mode in hardware.

methods.name: wifi_setBandSteeringApGroup
methods.description: Set the Band Steering Access Point Group.

methods.name: wifi_setBandSteeringOverloadInactiveTime
methods.description: Set the overload inactive time parameter.

methods.name: wifi_setBandSteeringIdleInactiveTime
methods.description: Set the idle inactive time parameter.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioFragmentationThreshold
methods.description: sets the fragmentation threshold in bytes for the radio used by this ap

methods.name: wifi_setRadioSTBCEnable
methods.description: Enable STBC mode in the hardware, 0 == not enabled, 1 == enabled.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioAMSDUEnable
methods.description: Outputs A-MSDU enable status, 0 == not enabled, 1 == enabled.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioAMSDUEnable
methods.description: Enables A-MSDU in the hardware, 0 == not enabled, 1 == enabled.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioTxChainMask
methods.description: Outputs the number of Tx streams.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioTxChainMask
methods.description: Sets the number of Tx streams to an environment variable.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioRxChainMask
methods.description: Outputs the number of Rx streams.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioRxChainMask
methods.description: Sets the number of Rx streams to an environment variable.

methods.name: wifi_pushBridgeInfo
methods.description: Deprecated: push the BridgeInfo environment variables to the hardware.

methods.name: wifi_pushRadioChannel
methods.description: Deprecated: push the channel number setting to the hardware.

methods.name: wifi_pushRadioChannelMode
methods.description: Deprecated: push the channel mode environment variable that is set by 'wifi_setChannelMode()' to the hardware.

methods.name: wifi_pushRadioTxChainMask
methods.description: Deprecated: push the environment variable set by 'wifi_setTxChainMask()' to the hardware.

methods.name: wifi_pushRadioRxChainMask
methods.description: Deprecated: push the environment variable set by 'wifi_setRxChainMask()' to the hardware.

methods.name: wifi_pushSSID
methods.description: Push the environment variable set by 'wifi_setSsidName' to the hardware.

methods.name: wifi_pushSsidAdvertisementEnable
methods.description: Push the SSID advertisement enable variable to the hardware.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioUpTime
methods.description: Get the number of seconds elapsed since radio is started.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioReverseDirectionGrantSupported
methods.description: Get radio RDG enable support.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioReverseDirectionGrantEnable
methods.description: Get radio RDG enable setting.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioReverseDirectionGrantEnable
methods.description: Set radio RDG enable setting.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioDeclineBARequestEnable
methods.description: Get radio ADDBA (ADD Block Acknowledgement) enable setting.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioDeclineBARequestEnable
methods.description: Set radio ADDBA (ADD Block Acknowledgement) enable setting.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioAutoBlockAckEnable
methods.description: Get radio auto block ack enable setting.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioAutoBlockAckEnable
methods.description: Set radio auto block ack enable setting.

methods.name: wifi_getRadio11nGreenfieldSupported
methods.description: Get radio 11n pure mode enable support.

methods.name: wifi_getRadio11nGreenfieldEnable
methods.description: Get radio 11n pure mode enable setting.

methods.name: wifi_setRadio11nGreenfieldEnable
methods.description: Set radio 11n pure mode enable setting.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioIGMPSnoopingEnable
methods.description: Get radio IGMP snooping enable setting.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioIGMPSnoopingEnable
methods.description: Set radio IGMP snooping enable setting.

methods.name: wifi_createAp
methods.description: creates a new ap and pushes these parameters to the hardware.

methods.name: wifi_deleteAp
methods.description: Deletes this ap entry on the hardware, clears all internal variables associated with this ap.

methods.name: wifi_getApName
methods.description: Outputs a 16 byte or less name associated with the AP.

methods.name: wifi_getApIndexFromName
methods.description: Outputs the index number in that corresponds to the SSID string.

methods.name: wifi_getApBeaconType
methods.description: Outputs a string indicating the beacon type (e.g., 'None', 'Basic', 'WPA', '11i', 'WPAand11i').

methods.name: wifi_setApBeaconType
methods.description: Sets the beacon type environment variable.

methods.name: wifi_setApBeaconInterval
methods.description: Sets the beacon interval on the hardware for this AP.

methods.name: wifi_setApDTIMInterval
methods.description: Sets the DTIM interval for this AP.

methods.name: wifi_getApRtsThresholdSupported
methods.description: Get the packet size threshold supported.

methods.name: wifi_setApRtsThreshold
methods.description: Sets the packet size threshold in bytes to apply RTS/CTS backoff rules.

methods.name: wifi_getApWpaEncryptionMode
methods.description: Outputs the WPA encryption mode (e.g., 'TKIPEncryption', 'AESEncryption', 'TKIPandAESEncryption').

methods.name: wifi_setApWpaEncryptionMode
methods.description: Sets the WPA encryption mode environment variable.

methods.name: wifi_removeApSecVaribles
methods.description: Deletes internal security variables for this AP.

methods.name: wifi_disableApEncryption
methods.description: Disables encryption on this AP.

methods.name: wifi_setApAuthMode
methods.description: Sets the authorization mode on this AP.

methods.name: wifi_setApBasicAuthenticationMode
methods.description: Sets an environment variable for the authentication mode.

methods.name: wifi_getApBasicAuthenticationMode
methods.description: Gets an environment variable for the authentication mode.

methods.name: wifi_getApNumDevicesAssociated
methods.description: Outputs the number of stations associated per AP.

methods.name: wifi_kickApAssociatedDevice
methods.description: Manually removes an active Wi-Fi association with a specified device.

methods.name: wifi_getApRadioIndex
methods.description: Outputs the radio index for the specified AP.

methods.name: wifi_setApRadioIndex
methods.description: Sets the radio index for the specific AP.

methods.name: wifi_getApAclDevices
methods.description: Get the ACL MAC list per AP.

methods.name: wifi_addApAclDevice
methods.description: Add a MAC address to the filter list.

methods.name: wifi_delApAclDevice
methods.description: Delete a MAC address from the filter list.

methods.name: wifi_getApAclDeviceNum
methods.description: Outputs the number of devices in the filter list.

methods.name: wifi_kickApAclAssociatedDevices
methods.description: Enable kick for devices on ACL black list.

methods.name: wifi_setApMacAddressControlMode
methods.description: Sets the MAC address filter control mode (0: disabled, 1: whitelist, 2: blacklist).

methods.name: wifi_setApVlanEnable
methods.description: Enables internal gateway VLAN mode.

methods.name: wifi_setApVlanID
methods.description: Sets the VLAN ID for this AP.

methods.name: wifi_getApBridgeInfo
methods.description: Gets bridge name, IP address, and subnet.

methods.name: wifi_setApBridgeInfo
methods.description: Sets bridge name, IP address, and subnet.

methods.name: wifi_resetApVlanCfg
methods.description: Resets VLAN configuration for this AP.

methods.name: wifi_createHostApdConfig
methods.description: Creates configuration variables needed for WPA/WPS, implementation-specific.

methods.name: wifi_startHostApd
methods.description: Starts hostapd service.

methods.name: wifi_stopHostApd
methods.description: Stops hostapd service.

methods.name: wifi_restartHostApd
methods.description: Restarts hostapd service.

methods.name: wifi_setApEnable
methods.description: Sets the AP enable status variable.

methods.name: wifi_getApEnable
methods.description: Outputs the internal variable that indicates whether the AP is enabled.

methods.name: wifi_getApStatus
methods.description: Outputs the current status ('Enabled' or 'Disabled') of the AP.

methods.name: wifi_getApSsidAdvertisementEnable
methods.description: Indicates whether SSID advertisements are enabled.

methods.name: wifi_setApSsidAdvertisementEnable
methods.description: Sets the internal variable for SSID advertisement.

methods.name: wifi_pushApSsidAdvertisementEnable
methods.description: Pushes the SSID advertisement setting to hardware.

methods.name: wifi_getApRetryLimit
methods.description: Gets the maximum number of retransmissions for a packet.

methods.name: wifi_setApRetryLimit
methods.description: Sets the maximum number of retransmissions for a packet.

methods.name: wifi_getApWMMCapability
methods.description: Indicates if the access point supports WMM.

methods.name: wifi_getApUAPSDCapability
methods.description: Indicates if U-APSD is supported.

methods.name: wifi_getApWmmEnable
methods.description: Indicates whether WMM support is enabled.

methods.name: wifi_setApWmmEnable
methods.description: Enables/disables WMM support.

methods.name: wifi_getApWmmUapsdEnable
methods.description: Indicates if U-APSD support is enabled.

methods.name: wifi_setApWmmUapsdEnable
methods.description: Enables/disables U-APSD support.

methods.name: wifi_setApWmmOgAckPolicy
methods.description: Sets WMM ACK policy on hardware.

methods.name: wifi_getApIsolationEnable
methods.description: Gets the AP isolation setting.

methods.name: wifi_setApIsolationEnable
methods.description: Enables/disables device isolation.

methods.name: wifi_getApMaxAssociatedDevices
methods.description: Get max number of associated devices.

methods.name: wifi_setApMaxAssociatedDevices
methods.description: Set max number of associated devices.

methods.name: wifi_getApAssociatedDevicesHighWatermarkThreshold
methods.description: Get watermark threshold for associated devices, less than or equal to MaxAssociatedDevices.

methods.name: wifi_setApAssociatedDevicesHighWatermarkThreshold
methods.description: Set watermark threshold for associated devices.

methods.name: wifi_getApAssociatedDevicesHighWatermarkThresholdReached
methods.description: Get number of times the associated devices count reached the threshold.

methods.name: wifi_getApAssociatedDevicesHighWatermark
methods.description: Maximum number of associated devices ever since reset.

methods.name: wifi_getApAssociatedDevicesHighWatermarkDate
methods.description: UTC timestamp when maximum was reached.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioAutoChannelRefreshPeriodSupported
methods.description: Check if the driver supports the AutoChannelRefreshPeriod.

methods.name: wifi_getApAssociatedDeviceDiagnosticResult2
methods.description: Provides a list of the devices currently associated with the access point, including detailed signal and byte transfer metrics.

ctags.name: BlacklistTableTimeout
ctags.pattern: /^	 INT  BlacklistTableTimeout; 		\/\/Time interval in seconds for which a client will continue to/

ctags.name: IdentityRequestRetryInterval
ctags.pattern: /^	 INT  IdentityRequestRetryInterval; \/\/Time Interval in seconds between identity requests retr/

ctags.name: MACAddress
ctags.pattern: /^        UCHAR MACAddress[6];                \/**< The MAC address of an associated device. *\/$/

ctags.name: MaxAuthenticationAttempts
ctags.pattern: /^	 INT  MaxAuthenticationAttempts; 	\/\/Indicates the # of time, a client can attempt to login wi/

ctags.name: PMKCacheInterval
ctags.pattern: /^	 INT  PMKCacheInterval; 			\/\/Time interval in seconds after which the PMKSA (Pairwise Master /

ctags.name: PMKCaching
ctags.pattern: /^	 BOOL PMKCaching; 					\/\/Enable or disable caching of PMK.	$/

ctags.name: PMKLifetime
ctags.pattern: /^	 INT  PMKLifetime; 					\/\/Default time in seconds after which a Wi-Fi client is forced to ReA/

ctags.name: QuietPeriodAfterFailedAuthentication
ctags.pattern: /^	 INT  QuietPeriodAfterFailedAuthentication;  \/\/The enforced quiet period (time interval) in s/

ctags.name: RadiusServerRequestTimeout
ctags.pattern: /^	 INT  RadiusServerRequestTimeout; 	\/\/Radius request timeout in seconds after which the reques/

ctags.name: RadiusServerRetries
ctags.pattern: /^	 INT  RadiusServerRetries; 			\/\/Number of retries for Radius requests.$/
